energy.usef.agr.pbcfeederimpl

Class PbcFeederService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.agr.pbcfeederimpl.PbcFeederService

  • public class PbcFeederService
extends Object
    This class is the entry point for all data that is being 'fed' to the Aggregator PBCs.

      • retrieveUDIListWithPvLoadForecast

        public List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> retrieveUDIListWithPvLoadForecast(org.joda.time.LocalDate date,
                                                                      List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connections,
                                                                      int ptuDuration,
                                                                      int dtuDuration)
        This method creates and adds a UDI to every connection. The UDI is a PV, with the PVForecast values from the stubinputdatasheet.
        Parameters:
        date -
        connections -
        ptuDuration -
        dtuDuration -
        Returns:
        connectionDtos with UDI for Photo-voltaic forecast.

      • retrieveUDIListWithPvLoadAveragePower

                                                                          List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connections,
                                                                          int ptuDuration)
        This method creates and adds two UDI's to every connection. The UDI is a PV, with the PVForecast values from the stubinputdatasheet.
        Parameters:

        connections -
        ptuDuration -
        Returns:
        connectionDtos with UDI's for Photo-voltaic forecast.

      • retrieveNonUDIListWithForecast

        public List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> retrieveNonUDIListWithForecast(org.joda.time.LocalDate forecastDay,
                                                                   List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connections,
                                                                   int ptuDuration)
        Fills a connection portfolio with forecasts based on the pbc spreadsheet data and ignoring the udi's.
        Parameters:
        forecastDay - the period (LocalDate)
        connections - the connection portfolio
        ptuDuration - the number of minutes for one ptu
        Returns:
        List of ConnectionPortfolioDto's.

      • retrieveApxPrices

        public Map<Integer,BigDecimal> retrieveApxPrices(org.joda.time.LocalDate date,
                                                 int startPtuIndex,
                                                 int amountOfPtus)
        Retrieves the APX prices from the data input sheet for a given period and a given duration.
        Parameters:
        date - LocalDate period.
        startPtuIndex - Integer starting ptu index of the duration (must be greater than 0).
        amountOfPtus - Integer amount of ptus of the duration.
        Returns:
        a Map of ptu index as key and APX price as value.

      • updateUdiLoadForecast

        public List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> updateUdiLoadForecast(org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                          int ptusPerDay,
                                                          List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connections)
        This method fills the 'ADS' devices with a value between 500W and 2000W. This value does not vary over the given PTUs. The 'PV' devices are filled based on PBCFeeder data.
        Parameters:
        period -
        ptusPerDay -
        connections - @return

      • fillElementsFromPBCFeeder

        public List<ElementDto> fillElementsFromPBCFeeder(List<ConnectionPortfolioDto> connectionPortfolioDtoList,
                                                  org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                                  Integer ptusPerDay,
                                                  Integer ptuSize)
        Creates and fills elements for a list of ConnectionPortfolioDto's.

        3 Element's are created: 1 ADS(MANAGED_DEVICE_, 1 PV(MANAGED_DEVICE) and one UCL(SYNTHETIC_DATA).

        Parameters:
        connectionPortfolioDtoList -
        period -
        ptusPerDay -
        ptuSize -
        Returns:
